item.title: Minimum Penalty for a Shop
item.description: Minimum Penalty for a Shop. leetcode.com . Accessed Jul 21, 2024. Problem You are given the customer visit log of a shop represented by a zero-indexed string customers consisting only of characters N and Y. If the \(i^{th}\) character is Y, it means that customers come at the \(i^{th}\) hour, whereas N indicates that no customers come at the \(i^{th}\) hour.
